Articles.Content:
had this problem before, but never really paid a lot of attention to it since it didn't happen a lot, but i now know why and where it happens.

It happens when i try to use symmetry mode when using a TVR-1180C Mk1 stack tri-coupler in the airplane hangar, the symmetry doesn't work, even tho the color of both things i want to place is green, then when i want to switch back from the dual attachment, it doesn't respond and i have to exit the hangar and go back in again to make it work.

Tho idk why this is happening, it's anoying when i want to use symmetry to line everything perfect :/

that symmetry doesn't go back to 1, stays like that until i exit the hangar
I saw that as well. I found that you can remove the tricoupler and get a new one to fix it though, you don't need to exit the hanger.
